comment._content: George Tyler was a New York theatrical manager (Liebler & Co.) A story in The New York Times, August 6, 1911, tells of Tyler's return after four months in Europe (and Morocco): query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9803E7DF163CE6...

comment._content: LOC -- Morocco is misspelled in your title.
